# VEHICLE::IS_VEHICLE_IN_SUBMARINE_MODE

## Summary
Returns true if the vehicle is in submarine mode

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Checks to see if the vehicle is in submarine mode
